english.segment1: I look upon Your hill. Your broken body hanging still. Your blood drips down. Your face and brow. You broght me life through death. No greater Love than this
english.segment2: [Chorus]. Surely He's borne our grief. Carried our sorrow. Though we've gone astray. It's by His stripes and wounds. We were healed. On that glorious day.
english.segment3: Oh Lord, You've worn the crown. I've placed uponYour head. Oh Lord, I've pierced Your hands. Yet Your blood declares my innocence
